results.title: Metformin suppressed tendon injury-induced adhesion via hydrogel-nanoparticle sustained-release system.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ suppressed @DISEASE_Tendon_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D013708 @@@tendon injury@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Tissue_Adhesions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000267 @@@adhesion@@@ via hydrogel-nanoparticle sustained-release system.

results.title: Effect of Metformin on HIF-1alpha Signaling and Postoperative Adhesion Formation.
results.text_hl: Repurposing the clinically approved drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ might be useful to prevent or treat @<m>DISEASE_Tissue_Adhesions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000267 @@@postoperative adhesions@@@.

results.title: Metformin Promotes Regeneration of the Injured Endometrium Via Inhibition of Endoplasmic Reticulum Stress-Induced Apoptosis.
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to determine the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on reducing @<m>DISEASE_Tissue_Adhesions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000267 @@@adhesions@@@ in an animal model of @<m>DISEASE_Tissue_Adhesions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000267 @@@IUA@@@.

results.title: Metformin and atorvastatin reduce adhesion formation in a rat uterine horn model.
results.text_hl: The aim of the present study was to determine whether @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ are effective in preventing @<m>DISEASE_Tissue_Adhesions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000267 @@@adhesions@@@ in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ uterine horn model.

citations.NLM: Yilmaz B, Aksakal O, Gungor T, Sirvan L, Sut N, Kelekci S, Soysal S, Mollamahmutoglu L. Metformin and atorvastatin reduce adhesion formation in a rat uterine horn model. Reprod Biomed Online. 2009 Mar;18(3):436-42. PMID: 19298747

results.title: The effects of metformin and letrozole on endometriosis and comparison of the two treatment agents in a rat model.
results.text_hl: The histopathologic assessment revealed that the histopathologic score of implants was lowest after 100 mg/kg/day @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Additionally, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduced the severity of @<m>DISEASE_Tissue_Adhesions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000267 @@@adhesions@@@.

citations.NLM: Oner G, Ozcelik B, Ozgun MT, Serin IS, Ozturk F, Basbug M. The effects of metformin and letrozole on endometriosis and comparison of the two treatment agents in a rat model. Hum Reprod. 2010 Apr;25(4):932-7. PMID: 20133323
